subject: "Leading Inclusively" for an EMEA audience on 10 March?
body:
Hello, Almendra,  
How are you today? I know you’ve worked with others at LCW and I’ve heard great things about you!
I wanted to see if by chance you might be up to facilitating a “Leading Inclusively” workshop for one of our clients (a global medical devices company) for an EMEA (mostly European) audience on March 10
th
 from 11am to 2pm CET (with a 10 min break). We have already designed the content and facilitator notes.
Here’s the bad news - our budget is quite small at this time due to current strains to our industry, as I’m sure you’re well aware…. So we can’t pay our usual rates at this time. We cannot afford to pay more than $300 per hour of facilitation, so the total would be $300*3 = $900, including prep.
 
What do you think? 
Warmly,
Rebecca
 
Rebecca M. Parrilla
 
(MBA, Latina, LGBTQ, Mom)
(she/her) 
Why pronouns matter
Head of Client Solutions
We help develop the mindsets and systems needed to foster resilient, diverse, and equitable teams that will be successful in a cross-cultural world.
Website
 
|
 
Facebook
 
|
 
LinkedIn
 
I live and work in Chapel Hill, NC – on the traditional homelands of the Occaneechi, Shakori, Eno, and Sissipahaw peoples.

Hi Britelings, Thank you in advance for taking part in our focus group which will help Eventbrite design strategies to improve belonging.This is an opportunity to dive deeper into opportunities to ens
  
 
This event has been updated
Changed:
 description
 
  
 
Description
CHANGED
Hi Britelings, 
Thank you in advance for taking part in our focus group which will help Eventbrite design strategies to improve belonging.This is an opportunity to dive deeper into opportunities to ensure our organization is diverse, inclusive, and equitable for you and your teams.
It is critical to the DEI team that all individuals who join the focus groups participate in a way that makes them feel comfortable and safe to share their insights. Please know we have a strong commitment to maintaining confidentiality at the utmost level. We will NOT share any names or identifying information, but we will share the insights you provide. In addition, we willNOT be recording the sessions.
All focus groups are 1-hour in length and will be conducted virtually via Zoom.
Your focus group will be conducted on November 29th at 5:30 am PT.
We have partnered with LCW, a global training and consulting firm focused on intercultural competence, DEI, and debiasing talent processes, to lead the focus groups. 
We look forward to your participation and thank you again for partaking in our focus group. Should you have any questions at all, please reach out to me directly.
Thank you on behalf of Eventbrite and LCW.
If you have any questions at all please don't hesitate to reach out to Bridget Cincotta.

Dear Team,
 
Last month, I shared our excitement 
to continue our journey to deliver on our 
commitment and planned strategic actions to kick off a holistic approach to Strengthen Leadership Capabilities and continue to Build Inclusive Leadership skills.   
 
We are strategically investing time and resources to build these skills and capabilities. We
 
heard from you (
Our Voice/Credo Surveys
) that we have an opportunity to strengthen leadership capabilities and continue to equip everyone to foster a
 
culture of inclusion and support an environment
 
where each of you are considered a unique individual. 
 
In the spirit of learning together, you will receive a calendar invitation from me with the preferred options for our team to dedicate the time and space to engage in these conversations.  This session will be focused on 
The Power of Allyship
. 
We will offer 3 sessions to fit various global time zones, 
please plan to attend 1 of the 3 that are offered
. 
The Zoom link is enclosed in the “location” section of the meeting hold
.   Please note, these sessions 
will not
 be recorded due to the sensitive/proprietary nature of the contents. 
 
Thank you for your continued engagement and 
I encourage you to invest in your development and attend one these sessions
.  
 
Best,
Chris

In the spirit of learning together, you will receive a calendar invitation from me with the preferred options for our team to dedicate the time and space to engage in these conversations.  This session will be focused on 
Understanding Microaggressions
. 
We will offer 3 sessions to fit various global time zones, 
please plan to attend 1 of the 3 that are offered
. The Zoom link is enclosed in the “location” section of the meeting hold.  Please note, these sessions 
will 
not be recorded due to the sensitive/proprietary nature of the contents.
 
Thank you for your continued engagement and 
I encourage you to invest in your development and attend these sessions
.  
 
Best,
Chris

subject: RE: new client/project - June 20 availability
body:
Hi Almendra,
 
It’s great to hear from you, and I hope you have been well!
 
I’m sorry to say that Grace is no longer with LCW. However, I have taken over duties for this client, and I will definitely reach out to you in the future should we need someone outside of our in-house staff to facilitate for this. Right now, though, things are pretty quiet, so I don’t think I need to take up your time with a meeting to discuss them (just yet 
😊
).
 
All the best,
Vince

For right now it turns out that we will not need support on June 20, but we expect a good amount of these trainings with this client, so I’d still love to find time, bring you up to speed on the client, and get in a good place for when their requests start coming in. >
Subject:
 new client/project - June 20 availability
 
 
Hello Almendra,
 
It was so lovely to facilitate with you the other month! I was hoping to have an opportunity to work together again, and a new client need has come up. I am reaching out to see if you are both available and interested in supporting a few deliveries of our Understanding Microaggressions training. The courses will be delivered in English, but our client (the Inter-American Development Bank) is eager for a facilitator that can receive and answer questions in Spanish. I also think it will make the training even more effective.
 
Are you interested? And if you are, might you be available for an initial training on June 20 from 3-4:30 PM EST? 
 
I’d love to set up a quick time to chat through the project if you’re interested and able (even if you can’t make that specific time work) – let me know what you think!
 
Thanks,
Grace
 
------------------------------------------------------
Grace Vottero
